attributes.action: withdraw his apparent support for the admission of Turkey to the EU
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: recognise that the British people will not support the admission of Turkey to the EU until Turkey has reached acceptable agreements with two existing member states - Cyprus and Greece -  that neither he nor the current British Government has a mandate to offer such support, and that the admission of Turkey in the current situation would be repugnant.
